appName: Highway Traffic Racer : Car racing game
displayName: Highway Traffic Racer : Car racing game
display_name: Highway Traffic Racer : Car racing game
display_long_description:
Highway Traffic Racer: Car Racing Game delivers the ultimate fast-paced car racing and VR driving simulator experience. master the highway traffic, and feel the rush of realistic driving physics. Every race is a test of skill, reflex, and pure speed as you race, drift, and dodge through endless roads like a true traffic racer and pro driver.

🌟 Gameplay Features 🌟

🏁 Multiple Game Modes
Challenge Mode – Complete tough racing missions and prove your driving skills.
Time Trial – Race fast, beat the timer, and set new records.
Traffic Rush – Speed through heavy highway traffic and stay in control.
Free Mode – Enjoy relaxed car driving and explore at your own pace.

🚗 Cars & Customization
Unlock a wide selection of sports cars and also F1 race car, each with unique performance and handling. Customize colors, and build your dream car simulator ride to dominate the highway.

🌍 Realistic Environments
Drive through green forests, hot deserts, and mountain highways, each designed for a true VR racing experience.

🚦 Two-Way Traffic System
Race on realistic highways filled with cars, buses, and trucks moving in both directions. 

💨 True Sense of Speed
Experience immersive motion blur, reflections, and dust that capture the thrill of fast highway racing.

🚔 Police Chase Coming Soon
New high-speed pursuits are coming soon, prepare for ultimate traffic racer challenge!

Race fast. Drive smart. Rule the road in Highway Traffic Racer, the ultimate VR car racing and driving simulator!
